review:
As vegetarians, our meal was amazing. 

The highlights:
- The mushroom tortilla 
- The cheese and tomato salad
- The cheese and honey flan

Simple.... Wow. Amazing. Easily the best meal I had in Madrid. Almost lost a star for the server who took our drink order and brought water. Not sure what the attitude.... We came here on a friends recommendation and I am glad we did.  This was without a doubt my favorite meal in Madrid. It is located in a pretty upscale....

address: Calle del General Pardiñas, 40, 28001 Madrid, Spain
review:
We had a really unique experience, no menu per se, but a chef flown in from a small town in Mexico was in residence for a week or so and had a full menu.... Very disappointing food and service. It took more than 15 minutes to bring our drink order and we had to remind them to bring it.

Ordering the food was.... Good food but simple taco at ten times normal price is outlandish.  Margarita for 13 euros total ripoff. Get slightly better pricing and I am happy to return.
